(D) Spawning distribution: CM - MOST IN FIRST 1/2 MILE, SCATTERED THEREAFTER CO - WIDELY SCATTERED
(E) Comments on predators: NONE OBSERVED, BUT PROBABLY LIGHT BY DOGS, BIRDS
(H) recommended enhancement: NONE AT PRESENT - POTENTIAL FOR P.I.P. OR HABITAT RESTORATION UNIT FOR COHO, PINK (ESTAB. ), CHUM
(K) Additional comments: MINOR FLOOD-PROTECTION WORK EST. 50 M. ABOVE HIGHWAY 19. NO EFFECT ON FISH HABITAT.
